## Setup


```{r load packages for data processing, hide=TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
library(ggforce)
library(ggridges)
library(ggsci)
library(wesanderson)
library(gghighlight)
```


## Data overview

An overview of the samples as of 26th April 2021 is stored in *Guineafowl-lcWGS_DataOverview_20210426.csv*. This is needed to later assign the relatedness estimates to specific individuals

```{r import data analysis overview}
sample_overview <- read.csv("data/Guineafowl-lcWGS_DataOverview_20210426.csv", header = TRUE, sep = ";", as.is = TRUE)
str(sample_overview)

```
